metadata.title: Ebdaa Falcon - Petroleum Derivatives and Logistics Services
metadata.description: Ebdaa Falcon is specialized in storing, transporting, and trading petroleum products. We provide integrated logistics solutions across marine ports and inland operations, representing international partners to ensure efficiency, reliability, and world-class service standards.
metadata.keywords: petroleum, logistics, energy, storage, trading, marine ports, Middle East, Saudi Arabia

hero.title: Petroleum Derivatives and Logistics Services
hero.description: Ebdaa Falcon is specialized in storing, transporting, and trading petroleum products. We also provide integrated logistics solutions across marine ports and inland operations, representing international partners to ensure efficiency, reliability, and world-class service standards.
hero.logisticDescription: Provide integrated logistics solutions across marine ports and inland operations, representing international partners to ensure efficiency, reliability, and world-class service standards.
hero.oilDescription: Ebdaa Falcon is specialized in storing, transporting, and trading petroleum products.
hero.waterDescription: Desalination is the process of converting salt water into pure fresh water. It is suitable for drinking and daily use.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.leftDescription: To be a leading force in the energy and logistics sectors, driving sustainable growth and excellence across the Middle East and beyond
vision.rightDescription: Building strategic partnerships and delivering innovative solutions that create lasting value for our clients and communities

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Driving Excellence in Energy, Logistics & Sustainability
services.description: We provide integrated solutions across oil & gas, logistics, and renewable energy sectors, delivering excellence through strategic partnerships and innovative approaches.
services.additionalServicesDescription: Explore our expanded range of specialized services designed to meet your unique requirements.

applications.renewableEnergyDescription: Supporting the transition to sustainable energy with innovative logistics and storage solutions.

detail.featureDescription: {serviceTitle} includes: {feature} as part of our comprehensive offering.

oil-gas-solutions.title: Oil & Gas Solutions
oil-gas-solutions.summary: Comprehensive petroleum storage, trading, and logistics solutions with advanced safety systems and strategic partnerships.
oil-gas-solutions.content: Our oil and gas solutions provide comprehensive petroleum storage, trading, and logistics services with advanced safety systems, strategic partnerships, and cutting-edge technology to ensure optimal performance and reliability.
oil-gas-solutions.detailedContent: We offer state-of-the-art petroleum storage facilities, automated trading systems, comprehensive logistics networks, and strategic partnerships across multiple regions. Our solutions include advanced safety monitoring, real-time market analysis, and integrated supply chain management.

logistics-marine-services.title: Logistics & Marine Services
logistics-marine-services.summary: World-class logistics across marine ports and inland operations to keep supply chains moving.
logistics-marine-services.content: We operate across marine and inland logistics to deliver reliability at scale. Our capabilities span port operations, documentation, inland transportation, and worldwide freight coordination.
logistics-marine-services.detailedContent: Our logistics and marine services provide comprehensive solutions for complex supply chain requirements. We handle everything from port operations and customs clearance to inland transportation and global freight coordination. Our experienced team ensures seamless operations across marine ports and inland facilities, maintaining the highest standards of efficiency and reliability.

engine-oils.title: Motor Oils
engine-oils.summary: High-quality Saudi-made motor oils engineered for durability and peak performance.
engine-oils.content: Our motor oils are specially formulated to provide superior protection and performance for both gasoline and diesel engines. We offer a comprehensive range of synthetic and mineral formulations designed to meet the demanding requirements of modern engines.
engine-oils.detailedContent: Our motor oil products are manufactured using advanced technology and premium base oils to ensure optimal engine protection and performance. We provide both synthetic and mineral formulations, each engineered for specific applications and operating conditions. Our oils are designed to provide extended engine protection, high-temperature stability, and fuel efficiency optimization while maintaining excellent viscosity characteristics across a wide temperature range.

renewable-energy-desalination.title: Alternative Energy & Water Desalination
renewable-energy-desalination.summary: Sustainable solar and wind energy solutions alongside advanced water desalination systems for clean energy and fresh water supply.
renewable-energy-desalination.content: Our alternative energy and water desalination services provide comprehensive renewable energy solutions including solar and wind power generation, hybrid energy systems, and advanced reverse osmosis desalination technology.
renewable-energy-desalination.detailedContent: We specialize in designing and implementing sustainable energy infrastructure that combines solar panels, wind turbines, and hybrid energy systems with state-of-the-art water desalination facilities. Our solutions include reverse osmosis desalination plants, sustainable infrastructure design, and comprehensive energy management systems.

about.title: Our Presence Around The World
about.description: Ebdaa Falcon operates across multiple regions, proudly serving clients and partners worldwide. With strong roots in Saudi Arabia, our presence extends to the Middle East, Africa, Asia, Europe, and the United States. Through strategic partnerships and integrated energy and logistics solutions, we deliver excellence that creates a global impact while supporting local growth.

presence.strongPresence: Strong presence in Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Egypt, and Tunisia
presence.expanding: Expanding across Morocco, Mauritania, Nigeria, and Indonesia
presence.partnerships: Active partnerships in USA, Europe, and Malaysia

globalReach.caption: Our strategic presence across key markets worldwide

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.description: Founded with a vision to revolutionize energy and logistics services, Ebdaa Falcon has grown into a trusted partner for companies worldwide, delivering innovative solutions and exceptional service quality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to provide superior, integrated services that meet the evolving needs of our clients. We are a premier provider of logistics services and a representative for global companies in petroleum derivatives, alternative energies, and water desalination.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: Inspired by the ambition of Saudi Vision 2030, Ebdaa Falcon is dedicated to pioneering integrated solutions in energy and logistics, driving progress, and building a sustainable future.

companyOverview.title: Company Overview
companyOverview.paragraph1: Ebdaa Falcon is a company that deals with international companies in the field of oil and gas, petroleum derivatives, sea ports and logistics services. We aim to reach the highest levels of excellence and superior service that meets your needs.
companyOverview.paragraph2: We are involved in storing, transporting and trading petroleum products. We represent international companies in the field of oil and gas derivatives, alternative energies and water desalination.

coreValues.title: Our Core Values
coreValues.subtitle: The principles that guide our decisions and shape our company culture.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest levels of excellence in all our operations and services.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Embracing innovative solutions to meet evolving industry demands.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: Maintaining the highest standards of integrity in all our business practices.

partnership.title: Partnership
partnership.description: Building strong, lasting partnerships with clients and stakeholders.

cta.title: Get to Know Us Better
cta.description: Ready to work with us? Let's discuss how we can help achieve your goals.

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.subtitle: Numbers that reflect our commitment to excellence and growth in the energy and logistics sectors.

clientSatisfaction.label: Client Satisfaction
clientSatisfaction.description: High satisfaction rate from our clients

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.quote: "My first goal is for our country to be a successful and pioneering model in the world at all levels, and I will work with you to achieve that."
purpose.attribution: – The Custodian of the Two Holy Mosques, King Salman bin Abdulaziz Al Saud
purpose.description: Inspired by the ambition of Saudi Vision 2030, Ebdaa Falcon is dedicated to pioneering integrated solutions in energy and logistics, driving progress, and building a sustainable future.

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.description: Ebdaa Falcon is a leading Saudi Arabian company specializing in a diverse portfolio of services across the energy and logistics sectors. We deal with international partners to deliver the highest levels of excellence in the storage, transportation, and trading of petroleum products.
whoWeAre.mission: Our mission is to provide superior, integrated services that meet the evolving needs of our clients. We are a premier provider of logistics services and a representative for global companies in petroleum derivatives, alternative energies, and water desalination.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
whatWeDo.subtitle: Our operations are diversified to cover the full spectrum of modern energy and infrastructure needs.

petroleumProducts.title: Petroleum Products & Logistics
petroleumProducts.description: We specialize in the creation, storage, and logistics of oil, gas, and petroleum derivatives. Our services include marine port management and a comprehensive logistics network. We manage a fleet capable of transporting crude oil and refined products such as diesel, petrol, kerosene, and gas.

alternativeEnergy.title: Alternative Energy
alternativeEnergy.description: As a forward-thinking company, we are dedicated to generating alternative energies, focusing on solar and wind power. We believe in a future powered by clean, renewable, and less costly energy sources that are less harmful to the environment.

waterDesalination.title: Water Desalination
waterDesalination.description: We address critical water needs through our water desalination services. Our process converts saltwater into pure, fresh water suitable for drinking and daily use, helping to support communities.

falconMotorOils.title: Falcon Motor Oils
falconMotorOils.description: We produce a specialized line of high-quality "Falcon Motor Oils" for both gasoline and diesel engines, ensuring optimal performance and protection.

globalPresence.title: Our Global Presence
globalPresence.subtitle: Interactive 3D globe showing our key regions and partnerships.
globalPresence.description: Headquartered in Riyadh, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, Ebdaa Falcon has a significant international footprint. Our operations and partnerships extend to:

leadership.title: Our Leadership
leadership.description: Ebdaa Falcon is led by a forward-looking management team committed to excellence and strategic growth.

ceo.name: Mosaed M. Al-Jhail
ceo.title: Chairman of the Board & Chief Executive Officer
ceo.description: Leading with vision, integrity, and operational excellence.

ourWorkPage.title: Our Work Portfolio
ourWorkPage.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive portfolio of energy and logistics projects that showcase our expertise and commitment to excellence.
ourWorkPage.getInTouchDescription: Let's discuss how we can help bring your energy and logistics vision to life.
ourWorkPage.portfolioDescription: We showcase our expertise through successful projects that demonstrate our commitment to excellence, innovation, and sustainable solutions across diverse industries and regions.
ourWorkPage.interestedDescription: Let's discuss how we can help bring your project to life with our expertise and innovative solutions.

petroleumStorageFacility.title: Petroleum Storage Facility
petroleumStorageFacility.description: Modern storage facility with advanced safety systems and capacity management.

petroleum-storage-facility.title: Petroleum Storage Facility
petroleum-storage-facility.description: Modern storage facility with advanced safety systems and capacity management.
petroleum-storage-facility.content: Our petroleum storage facility represents the pinnacle of modern storage technology, featuring advanced safety systems, automated monitoring, and comprehensive capacity management. This facility serves as a strategic distribution hub for petroleum products across the region.
petroleum-storage-facility.detailedContent: The facility includes multiple storage tanks with varying capacities, automated loading and unloading systems, comprehensive safety monitoring, and emergency response protocols. Our team ensures 24/7 operations with strict adherence to international safety standards.

featureDescription.0: Petroleum Storage Facility includes: Advanced storage systems as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.1: Petroleum Storage Facility includes: Safety compliance as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.2: Petroleum Storage Facility includes: Quality monitoring as part of our comprehensive project delivery.

tradingOperations.title: Trading Operations Center
tradingOperations.description: Strategic trading hub for petroleum products with real-time market analysis.

trading-operations.title: Trading Operations Center
trading-operations.description: Strategic trading hub for petroleum products with real-time market analysis.
trading-operations.content: Our trading operations center serves as a strategic hub for petroleum product trading, featuring real-time market analysis, automated trading systems, and comprehensive risk management protocols.
trading-operations.detailedContent: The center includes advanced trading platforms, real-time market data feeds, automated risk management systems, and a team of experienced traders and analysts working around the clock to optimize trading opportunities.

featureDescription.0: Trading Operations Center includes: Real-time market analysis as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.1: Trading Operations Center includes: Automated trading systems as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.2: Trading Operations Center includes: Risk management as part of our comprehensive project delivery.

refineryIntegration.title: Refinery Integration Project
refineryIntegration.description: Comprehensive refinery integration with advanced processing capabilities.

refinery-integration.title: Refinery Integration Project
refinery-integration.description: Comprehensive refinery integration with advanced processing capabilities.
refinery-integration.content: Our refinery integration project represents a comprehensive approach to modern refinery operations, featuring advanced processing capabilities, integrated systems, and optimized production workflows.
refinery-integration.detailedContent: The project includes state-of-the-art processing units, integrated control systems, advanced monitoring technologies, and comprehensive maintenance protocols to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

featureDescription.0: Refinery Integration Project includes: Advanced processing units as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.1: Refinery Integration Project includes: Integrated control systems as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.2: Refinery Integration Project includes: Optimized workflows as part of our comprehensive project delivery.

marine-port-expansion.title: Marine Port Expansion
marine-port-expansion.description: Strategic port expansion with modern handling facilities and logistics capabilities.
marine-port-expansion.content: Our marine port expansion project enhances regional logistics infrastructure with modern port facilities, advanced cargo handling systems, and comprehensive logistics integration.
marine-port-expansion.detailedContent: The expansion includes new berths, automated cargo handling equipment, expanded storage facilities, and integrated logistics systems to support growing regional trade volumes.

featureDescription.0: Marine Port Expansion includes: Modern port facilities as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.1: Marine Port Expansion includes: Advanced cargo systems as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.2: Marine Port Expansion includes: Logistics integration as part of our comprehensive project delivery.

inland-transportation-network.title: Inland Transportation Network
inland-transportation-network.description: Comprehensive inland transportation network with integrated distribution hubs.
inland-transportation-network.content: Our inland transportation network provides comprehensive logistics solutions with strategically located distribution hubs, modern fleet management, and integrated tracking systems.
inland-transportation-network.detailedContent: The network includes multiple distribution centers, GPS-tracked vehicles, automated routing systems, and real-time monitoring to ensure efficient and reliable inland transportation services.

featureDescription.0: Inland Transportation Network includes: Distribution hubs as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.1: Inland Transportation Network includes: Fleet management as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.2: Inland Transportation Network includes: Real-time tracking as part of our comprehensive project delivery.

warehousing-solutions.title: Warehousing Solutions
warehousing-solutions.description: Modern warehousing facilities with advanced inventory management systems.
warehousing-solutions.content: Our warehousing solutions offer state-of-the-art facilities with automated inventory management, climate-controlled storage, and comprehensive security systems.
warehousing-solutions.detailedContent: The facilities feature automated storage and retrieval systems, real-time inventory tracking, climate control for sensitive products, and 24/7 security monitoring to ensure product safety and accessibility.

featureDescription.0: Warehousing Solutions includes: Automated systems as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.1: Warehousing Solutions includes: Climate control as part of our comprehensive project delivery.
featureDescription.2: Warehousing Solutions includes: Security monitoring as part of our comprehensive project delivery.

hero.title: Frequently Asked Questions
hero.subtitle: Answers about our services, operations, and how to work with us

intro.title: Have questions? We’ve got answers.
intro.description: Below are the most common questions about our petroleum derivatives, logistics, renewable energy and water desalination services.

items.a: We serve energy, logistics, manufacturing, and infrastructure sectors across the Middle East and beyond.
We are headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia, with active operations and partners across the region.
We provide petroleum storage and trading, logistics and marine services, motor oils, alternative energy solutions, and water desalination.
Yes. We design solutions based on your technical, regulatory, and timeline requirements with clear SLAs.

items.q: Can you integrate with our existing logistics systems?
items.a: Yes. We integrate with popular TMS/WMS and provide secure APIs for data exchange.

items.q: Do you support international shipping and customs?
items.a: We handle port operations, documentation, customs clearance, and global freight coordination.
Projects begin with a discovery call, followed by requirements scoping, proposal, and a structured kickoff plan.
Timelines vary by scope. After scoping, we share a milestone plan with dependencies and risk mitigation.

items.q: What does your project handover include?
items.a: Handover includes documentation, training, safety protocols, and an agreed support plan.

items.q: How do you manage safety and compliance?
items.a: We adhere to international standards and local regulations with routine audits and certifications.

items.q: How can I request a quotation?
items.a: Use the contact form or email us at info@ebdaafalcon.com with your scope, location, and target timeline.
Yes. We provide warranty, maintenance options, and training as part of our engagement.

items.q: How do I get technical support?
items.a: Contact our support team via the contact form or email; SLAs are defined per contract.

items.q: Can I schedule a site visit?
items.a: Yes. Share your location and preferred dates and we’ll coordinate with our operations team.
